mapper.insert: insert into ALR_VALUE_ADDED_TAX_SCAN_RESULT (FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, IS_VALID, IS_VERIFIED, IS_EMEND, INVOICE_ID, INVOICE_CODE, INVOICE_DATE, CHECK_CODE, TAX_FREE_AMOUNT, UPDATE_DATE, BATCH_ID, OPERATOR, FAILED_REASON) values (#{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVerified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEmend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxFreeAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ALR_VALUE_ADDED_TAX_SCAN_RESULT set FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VERIFIED = #{isVerified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_EMEND = #{isEmend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_ID = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_CODE = #{invoiceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_DATE = #{invoiceDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_CODE = #{checkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAX_FREE_AMOUNT = #{taxFreeAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BATCH_ID = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAILED_REASON = #{failedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, IS_VALID, IS_VERIFIED, IS_EMEND, INVOICE_ID, INVOICE_CODE, INVOICE_DATE, CHECK_CODE, TAX_FREE_AMOUNT, UPDATE_DATE, BATCH_ID, OPERATOR, FAILED_REASON from ALR_VALUE_ADDED_TAX_SCAN_RESULT where FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, IS_VALID, IS_VERIFIED, IS_EMEND, INVOICE_ID, INVOICE_CODE, INVOICE_DATE, CHECK_CODE, TAX_FREE_AMOUNT, UPDATE_DATE, BATCH_ID, OPERATOR, FAILED_REASON from ALR_VALUE_ADDED_TAX_SCAN_RESULT
